A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Although some despise this movie for its wild departures from the norm\, I applaud its bravery. The sprawling long scenes served not as a disjointed mess but as a reminder that life is not one straight storyline where everything is connected. The universe is massive and a movie about a versatile galaxy deserves to depict different flavors. It wasn’t my favorite Star Wars movie but it was by no means the worst. It reminded me why I love Star Wars so much- because it took risks and opened doors. Science fiction is meant to reflect society today and I think it did a wonderful job drawing parallels. Highly recommended.
